pages.title: Berry Bush Damage
pages.text: All Chocobos will not take Berry Bush damage.

pages.title: Fall Damage
pages.text: All Chocobos will not take fall Damage, They Float.

pages.title: Fire/Lava Damage
pages.text: Flame & Gold Chocobos are Naturally immune.$(br)- This Trait can be passed on Through Breeding

pages.title: Water Breathing Ability
pages.text: Blue & Gold Chocobos can breath water.$(br)- This Trait can be passed on Through Breeding

pages.title: Poison Damage
pages.text: Green & Gold Chocobos are Naturally immune.$(br)- This Trait can be passed on Through Breeding

pages.title: Wither Damage
pages.text: Black & Gold Chocobos are Naturally immune.$(br)- This Trait can be passed on Through Breeding

pages.title: Freezing Damage
pages.text: White & Gold Chocobos are Naturally immune.

pages.title: Dragon Breath Damage
pages.text: Purple & Gold Chocobos are Naturally immune.
